item.title: 在这一天：1996 年，洛杉矶的一个陪审团判定埃里克-梅嫩德斯和莱尔-梅嫩德斯在用猎枪杀害其富有的父母一案中犯有一级谋杀罪。他们被判处终身监禁，不得假释。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 1996 a jury in Los Angeles convicted Erik and Lyle Menendez of first-degree murder in the shotgun slayings of their wealthy parents.

They were sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole. https://t.co/59acSWw78T pic.twitter.com/PtjyrsBIj5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 根据《2024 年世界幸福报告》，美国的排名下降了 8 位，不再是世界前 20 个最幸福的国家，落后于加拿大、以色列、科威特、立陶宛和阿拉伯联合酋长国等国。
item.description:
The United States has fallen eight spots and is no longer in the top 20 happiest countries in the world, falling behind countries like Canada, Israel, Kuwait, Lithuania and the United Arab Emirates, according to the 2024 World Happiness Report. https://t.co/mkyyt0HTVq pic.twitter.com/Jc2FxAtT9L

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国彩票机构表示，继本周二没有一张彩票中得大奖之后，预计周五开奖的 "兆彩 "头奖奖金将攀升至 9.77 亿美元。
item.description:
The Mega Millions jackpot is expected to climb to $977 Million for Friday's drawing, after no single ticket won the jackpot on Tuesday, the lottery said. https://t.co/167HWv2HbF pic.twitter.com/SSoQcbUTkJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 阿丽亚娜-格兰德（Ariana Grande）的祖母正在《公告牌》排行榜上创造历史。98 岁的玛乔丽-格兰德（Marjorie Grande），又名 "Nonna"，由于在孙女的新歌《平凡的事》（"ordinary things"）中演唱，成为《公告牌》Hot 100 排行榜上最年长的人。
item.description:
Ariana Grande's grandmother is making history on the Billboard charts.

At 98, Marjorie Grande, aka "Nonna," has become the oldest person to appear on the Billboard Hot 100 chart, thanks to her feature on her granddaughter's new song, "ordinary things." https://t.co/x6pdbig35I pic.twitter.com/o3YMbi9Tin

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024
